archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: NFFS Webservice
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation: A portal that provides staff involved in flood incident management access to flood forecast outputs from the NFFS system and Met Office alerts – • Met Office and Flood Forecasting Centre forecasts, alerts and warnings • Approved forecasts produced by NFFS • forecasting duty officers' comments on forecast quality • flood guidance statements • regional forecast outlook statements • standard and custom tide tables • Soil Moisture Deficit data (MORECS) • An archive since 2006 of all the above.
